resources.string: "തെറ്റ്: പ്രോഗ്രാം ഫയൽസ് കാണുന്നില്ല! ഇതു പരിഹരിക്കാൻ ഡാൽവിക്ക് കാഷ്യേ ചെക്ക് ചെയ്യുക! ഡിഫാൾട്ട്: /data/dalvik-cache/*"
LuckyPatcher is a universal patching tool. Intended to modify applications: remove ads, remove Google license verification (auto and manually), manage permissions and more.
Show all apps with Google Ads.
All changes were fixed in ODEX until app reinstallation!
Application not found! Please install Application and try again.
App Data is empty. There is nothing to backup.
Error: Something went wrong. Probably backup is incomplete.
Do you want to remove this directory bind?
Binding failed! Data directory not found on device.
"Warning: Busybox not found. Lucky Patcher can't continue..."
ഡാൽവിക്ക് കാഷ്യേ ക്ലീൻ ആക്കി റീബൂട്ട് ചെയ്യുക
Apk with changed Permissions and Activities
"Disable components 'pm disable' method (may be enabled by the app)"
"Change Permissions and Activities Rebuild and Install"
"Change Permissions and Activities Save original Signature (Safe method)"
"Patch on reboot (Unstable! Only for libs Patching)"

"Allows to modify app without making signature again, so developer's signature will stay untouched. Other users can install this .apk only after applying patch to Android Core (useful when translating, modifying graphics, etc. in protected apps)"
Disable signature verification in the package manager
Allows to Installing applications with different signatures on each other.
"+ Allows to Installing applications with older version than installed version."
Remove all patches from Android Core
If exists, allow Internet connection on the first launch. This group of patches makes minor changes.
If exists, probably there is no need in Internet connection on the first launch.
Still unstable, but very effective. If exists, allow Internet connection on the first launch.
Templates for final license verification. If this works fine, app will work without Internet connection.
If \"Final License Verification\" was unlucky, you can try these patches.
Try to resize ADS so it will become smaller.
Try to resize of Google ADS to Null/Zero
Trying to break the G Ads Obtaining Mechanism.
Other patches which can be useful to remove the ads.
Black rectangle that covers a banner (visible when \"Resize Ads to ...\" disabled ).
Remove License Verification for Applications from Amazon Market.
The minimal number of patches. Suitable for most applications with a simple protection.
There are a few differences from the \"Auto mode\". It may help you, if \"Auto mode\" was unlucky.
Additional patches (may cause unstability). Apply only if other patterns were unlucky. Requires Internet. Try to use together with \"Auto mode\" or \"Auto mode (Inversed)\".

By default all changes are written to odex-file. But this method will not work properly if app has been moved to external SD card. Then the \"Apply Patch to dalvik-cache\" could help. You can restore the app only by reinstallation.
"Will copy app package file to Lucky Patcher's folder on SD card. You can restore app from this apk."
Deletes dalvik cache of this app to save space after creating the odex-file . If the app does not work fine with odex, you will have to reinstall this app.
Remove License Verification for Applications from SamsungApps.

Dalvik-cache of core.jar patched, but this type of Patch can disappear when updating dalvik-cache. Not enough space in System ROM for creating core.odex. Please free about 4Mb, clear dalvik-cache and try again. Please reboot device to apply Patch to dalvik-cache.
Downloaded file corrupted. Please check free space on sdcard and try again later.
"Success! License has been created successfully. Try to test app in offline. Maybe you'll get lucky."
"Apk with removed License Verification (Extreme Auto mode)"

"
Nota Bene! If app works fine after the patch, there is no guarantee that it will work fine in the modified-apk form - some apps are protected from modification. You are tend to be more lucky with patching, than with modifying."
Shows all Aplications with Custom Patch applied.
Days location on top of the list after installation or update application. Set to 0 days if you want to disable the movement of recently installed applications to up.
ബൂട്ട് ലിസ്റ്റിൽ നിന്നു നീക്കം ചെയ്യാനായി സെലക്റ്റ് ചെയ്യുക
This app is a part of Android OS. Be very careful while performing any operations on it, because you can soft-brick your device. Have a backup? Are you sure you want to work with this application?
"Change directory on sdcard for LP files. Default path is /mnt/sdcard/LuckyPatcher"
Your are using the latest version of LP.
You can not install applications from this place, please place it to SD card.
Failed to backup apk-file. No permissions to copy.
Error in logger occured. Log not created.
Error create .oat file for patched classes.dex. Your firmware have bug to libraries of runtime ART .
Seems Lucky Patcher has force-closed, do you want to send bugreport?
Original pattern lenght not equal replace pattern lenght.
Data for making a license not found.
Error: Create odex process failed... Probably not enough disk space left.
Error to original pattern (you must write hex bytes).
Not enough memory (RAM) to complete this operation. VM Heap is too small.
Directory already exists. Please enter a new path.
Error to replace pattern (you must write hex bytes).
"പാച്ച് പൂർത്തിയായി! ആപ്പ് ഓൺ ആക്കി ലൈസൻസ് സ്റ്റാറ്റസ് പരിശോദിക്കൂ; -ഈ പാറ്റേൺ സഹായകമായില്ലെങ്കിൽ, ടാപ്പ് \"റീസ്റ്റോർ\" and repeat the procedure with another pattern."
"ഈ പാറ്റേണിനു ചേരുന്ന ടാഗ് കാണുന്നില്ല! മുൻപേ പാച്ച് ചെയ്തിട്ടുണ്ടോ?ടാപ്പ് \"റീസ്റ്റോർ\",പുതിയൊരു പാറ്റേൺ തിരഞ്ഞെടുത്ത് വീണ്ടും പാച്ച് ചെയ്യൂ."
"Disable loading icons from LP's database. Makes applist laggy..."
"Application was not copied to SD card! Please free some space on SD card or check your busybox."
Google Play has been installed. Now core.jar will be patched and device will be rebooted. Continue?
Show all apps with fixed changes (Yellow Star mark).

"% ഭാഗ്യം! ടെസ്റ്റ് ചെയ്യാനായി ആപ്പ് പ്രവർത്തിപ്പിക്കുക!
ആപ്പ്ളിക്കേഷൻ തെറ്റായി പ്രവർത്തിക്കുകയാണെങ്കിൽ ദയവായി റീ-ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾ ചെയ്യുകയും ഈ വെർഷനിൽ പാച്ച് ചെയ്യാതിരിക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുക."
install Google Play as user application.
Requires: already applied \"Patch to Android\" and installed Google Play Store.
Show all apps with License Verification.

"Press \"Install\" button to place the GPlay with cracked LVL (License Verification Library) instead of original one. If Google Play Store does not work after reboot, install it again. How modded GPlay works: Attention! Can NOT download paid apps for free! 1. You can use GoogleLVL-protected app without cracking. 2. Successful license verification while offline. 3. No need to apply patches anymore. 4. Will not work with Billing and License Verification via Proxy. 5. Now when you press 'Refund' button, it refunds, but the app won't be uninstalled, so you don't need to backup before refund."
"Can not extract AndroidManifest.xml. Maybe you don't have enough space on SD сard to copy entire app."

Dalvik-cache of core.jar has been patched, but this type of patch can disappear when updating dalvik-cache. Right now your core.jar will be optimized (created odex). Please make nandroid backup before tapping \"Yes\". Device may not answer for a few minutes. As a result, the device may freeze and require you to reboot manually. After booting go to \"Troubleshooting\", press \"clear dalvik-cache\" and \"Remove fixes and backups\". Got a backup? Create core.odex now?
"Path not found! Please enter correct path."
"SD card not found! This function can not work without sdcard!"
Please check \"Allow installation of apps from unknown sources\" in Security settings.
"Do you really want to clear all app's data?"
Do you really want to remove all odex files from /system/app and /data/app? Will only be deleted odex files by application that have classes.dex.

Google Play possibly installed but is not working properly. Test license check failed. Maybe you do not apply the patch core.jar (can be used in the \"Toolbox-> Patch to Android\") or not set itself a modified Google Play as system applicetion (you can re-install in the \"Toolbox-> Install modded Google Play Store\").
Turn off Internet on device and try test.
Test results for the modified GP
Google Play is installed and working properly. Note that this method does not work with all applications and games. This is not an error and can not be fixed.
Show all modified Aplications (Green Clover mark).
All data has been successfully transferred to
Do you really want to make this app part of the system?
New Version of Lucky Patcher Available!.

"It's is not a error. There was not enough free space to create .odex file. Dalvik-cache patch applied, but if you reboot patch can be lost. Solution: move app to internal storage or make as system or free up more space, or leave everything as is and re-apply patch regularly."
Removes all application icons in the list. Fastens operations. Useful for low-end devices.

"നിങ്ങളുടെ റൂട്ട് ആക്സസ് ശരി അല്ല..! ഈ ആപ്ളിക്കേഷൻ തുടരണമെങ്കിൽ റൂട്ട് ആക്സസ് വേണം...
(ദയവായി ബിസി ബോക്സ്,സൂപ്പർ യൂസർ ആപ്പ്ളിക്കേഷൻ അപ്ഡേറ്റ് ചെയ്യുക)!ദയവായി സൂപ്പർ യൂസർ ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾ ചെയ്യുക (\"പ്രശ്ന പരിഹാരം-> ഇൻസ്റ്റാൾ സൂപ്പർ യൂസർ (ICS)\") പിന്നെ അതിന്റെ എസ്.യു ബൈനറീസും അപ്ഡേറ്റ് ചെയ്യുക."
Error: not enough space to copy all data in specified folder. Please change directory or free up some space.
Error: not enough space in internal memory. Please free up more space in /data and try again.
Error: not enough space in System partition to move the application. Please free up space in /system and try again.
Error: not enough space in System partition. Please free up more space in /system and try again.
Shows all apps in which nothing was found.
Changelog file not found. It will be downloaded next time you update.
"ODEX all System Applications (more free space to int storage)"
Do you really want to ODEX all System Apps?
"Error! Probably there is not enough free space in the /system. Some apps weren't ODEXed."
At once can use \"Signature Verification status always True\" and \"Disable .apk Signature Verification\" or \"Disable signature verification in the package manager\".
No description available for this permission
"% ഭാഗ്യം! പാച്ചിങ്ങ് പരാജയപ്പെട്ടു! എൽ.വി.എൽ ന്റെ വെർഷൻ അറിയാൻ കഴിയുന്നില്ല ! അല്ലെങ്കിൽ പാച്ച് മുൻപേ അപ്ളൈ ചെയ്തിട്ടുണ്ട് !"
Dalvik cache of this app not found.
എല്ലാ ഒ.ഡി.ഇ.എക്സ് ഫയലുകളും നീക്കം ചെയ്യുക(/data/app and /system/app)
Error: Something went wrong. Data may be restored incompletely.
Do you really want to install
Root access required for this action...
You must move application to /system/app/ or apply patch to core.jar \"Disable Zip Signature Verify\" from \"Patch to Android\".
saved to /sdcard/LuckyPatcher/ as a custom patch.
"Please choose a version of Play Store to install: "
Do you want to send me your logs?
Attention! Please make BACKUP before modifying.
Do you really want to remove this application?
Enable haptic feedback for app list
